tasks.title: Run database migration in Supabase
tasks.description: Run the 0001_complete_5year_schema.sql migration in Supabase SQL Editor to create all tables
tasks.verification: Check that all 20 tables exist in Supabase database

tasks.title: Create storage buckets in Supabase
tasks.description: Follow docs/SUPABASE_STORAGE_SETUP.md to create 5 storage buckets with policies
tasks.verification: Verify all 5 buckets exist in Supabase Storage page and have correct policies

tasks.title: Start development server
tasks.description: Run pnpm dev to start the Next.js development server
tasks.verification: Confirm server starts successfully on http://localhost:3000

tasks.title: Test sign-in functionality
tasks.description: Navigate to /sign-in and test Google OAuth sign-in flow
tasks.verification: Successfully sign in with Google OAuth and redirect to profile page

tasks.title: Test consultant profile form
tasks.description: Go to /rebound/profile and fill out the consultant profile form with all new fields
tasks.verification: Profile saves successfully and all new fields are stored (yearsOfExperience, timezone, travelOpen, languages, profileSlug)

tasks.title: Test profile picture upload
tasks.description: Upload a profile picture using the profile picture upload component
tasks.verification: Profile picture uploads and displays correctly on the form

tasks.title: Test consultant search (Relay)
tasks.description: Navigate to /relay/consultants and search for consultants with various filters
tasks.verification: Search returns correct filtered results based on expertise, location, availability

tasks.title: Test contact consultant form
tasks.description: From a consultant profile, click contact and send an inquiry message
tasks.verification: Inquiry is created and visible in consultant's inquiries list

tasks.title: Test engagement creation
tasks.description: As an institution, create a new engagement with a consultant
tasks.verification: Engagement is created and visible in both consultant and institution dashboards

tasks.title: Test invoice generation
tasks.description: Create an invoice for an engagement and view the invoice PDF
tasks.verification: Invoice is created and PDF generates correctly with all details

tasks.title: Test messaging system
tasks.description: Send messages between consultant and institution in an engagement
tasks.verification: Messages are delivered and conversation updates correctly

tasks.title: Test admin consultant approval
tasks.description: As super admin, go to /admin/consultants and approve a pending consultant
tasks.verification: Consultant status changes to ACTIVE and they can be found in search

tasks.title: Test case studies feature
tasks.description: Create and publish a case study for a consultant
tasks.verification: Case study appears on consultant profile and in search results

tasks.title: Test testimonial submission
tasks.description: Submit a testimonial for a consultant from an engagement
tasks.verification: Testimonial is created and shows pending status until approved

tasks.title: Test public profile view
tasks.description: View a consultant's public profile using their profileSlug
tasks.verification: Public profile page displays correctly with all approved information
